Detailed Description

template<typename P, typename PS = P, typename S = pythagoras<P, PS>>
struct geometry::strategy::distance::xy_point_segment< P, PS, S >

Strategy functor for distance point to segment.

Calculates distance using projected-point method, and (optionally) Pythagoras

Author:
Adapted from: http://geometryalgorithms.com/Archive/algorithm_0102/algorithm_0102.htm
Template parameters:
  • P point type
  • PS point type of segments, optional, defaults to point type
  • S strategy, optional, defaults to pythagoras
Concepts for P and PS:
  • specialized point_traits class
Concepts for S:
  • distance_result operator(P,P)
